name: miru
description: dev server with livereloading and pretty error parsing and browser<->terminal output synchronization

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:client: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/client/main.js -o dist/miru-connect.js 2>&1 | wooster
scripts.watch:client: watchify -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/client/main.js -o dist/miru-connect.js 2>&1 | wooster
scripts.dev:css: node src/server/miru.js -w [ npm run watch:stage:css, test/stage/bundle.css ] -v -p test/stage/ --development
scripts.dev:js: node src/server/miru.js -w [ npm run watch:stage:js, test/stage/bundle.js ] -v -p test/stage/ --development
scripts.dev: node src/server/miru.js -w [ npm run watch:stage:js, test/stage/bundle.js ] -w [ npm run watch:stage:css, test/stage/bundle.css ] -p test/stage/ --development
scripts.dev2: node dist/miru.js -w [ npm run watch:stage:js, test/stage/bundle.js ] -w [ npm run watch:stage:css, test/stage/bundle.css ] -p test/stage/ --development
scripts.cli: ./cli.js -w [ npm run watch:stage:js, test/stage/bundle.js ] -w [ npm run watch:stage:css, test/stage/bundle.css ] -p test/stage/ --development
